duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and lead MSL team focused on enhancing patient outcomes through improved clinician engagement.
Develop and manage long-term relationships with identified opinion leaders and thought leaders to achieve scientific, educational, and business goals.
Collaborate with relevant groups to deliver effective educational workshops, seminars, and programs for physicians, pharmacists, and scientists.
Approve MSL budgetary plan and establish expenditure forecasts. Involved in health economic submissions to ensure correct medical positioning of product.
Establish performance management initiatives and metrics to ensure professional development of medical science liaisons.
Develop and lead a high-performing team, monitor, analyze, and improve group performance.
Provide expertise and coaching to team members as well as in-house functions.
